title: Sickle of BOOOAL
content:
(Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Infused with the inconceivable might of the formidable BOOOAL!

Sickle of BOOOAL Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found at The Festering Cove in the Underdark. Merchant: Pooldripp the Zealous Dropped by: Pooldripp the Zealous. Can be bought, stolen or looted.

Sickle of BOOOAL Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 150 Gp. Weight:
